title: Domino-cooling Oscillator Networks with Deep Reinforcement Learning
authors: Sampreet Kalita and Amarendra K. Sarma
abstract:
The exploration of deep neural networks for optimal control has gathered a
considerable amount of interest in recent years. Here, we utilize deep
reinforcement learning to control individual evolutions of coupled harmonic
oscillators in an oscillator network. Our work showcases a numerical approach
to actively cool internal oscillators to their thermal ground states through
modulated forces imparted to the external oscillators in the network. We
present our results for thermal cooling of all oscillators in multiple network
configurations and introduce the utility of our scheme in the quantum regime.
